sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react' import { SignInUser } from '../services/Auth' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const SignIn = ({ setUser, toggleAuthenticated }) => { let navigate = useNavigate() const [formValues, setFormValues] = useState({ email: '', password: '' }) const handleChange = (e) => { setFormValues({ ...formValues, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() const payload = await SignInUser(formValues) setFormValues({ email: '', password: '' }) setUser(payload) toggleAuthenticated(true) navigate('/schedule') window.location.reload() } return (
) } export default SignIn
